root.name: Shock Man
root.description: OverviewTransformed by a doctor from a human to a small, but powerful, android you are tasked with defeating eight levels of enemies with your laser. Critical ReceptionWhen released Electronic Gaming Monthly issued the following scores, 4,5,6,7 adding, "...This is a cute game that should appeal to a younger audience. It doesn't have the excitement of a kid's game and that could hurt it. It just offers flat game play and doesn't inspire me to continue farther into the game. The graphics, sound, action and everything is just average. Not the best Turbo game ever made".
